// Scroll utility functions
export const smoothScrollTo=function(elementId){let offset=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:80;const element=document.getElementById(elementId);if(element){const elementPosition=element.offsetTop;const offsetPosition=elementPosition-offset;window.scrollTo({top:offsetPosition,behavior:'smooth'});}};export const handleAnchorClick=function(e,targetId){let offset=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:80;e.preventDefault();smoothScrollTo(targetId,offset);};
